title: New: Waterwalls – Lonely Day
content:
This debut track from Paris’s Waterwalls may well be ‘chillwave by numbers’, but hey, if it works, why change it, right? So it’s very much Neon Indian meets Washed Out, yet it’s arguably better than half the tracks on either of the respective albums released by those two artists last year.

Synth heavy and vocals burdened with reverb, Lonely Day isn’t carving out new genres, and it’s certainly not going to spawn a host of copycat artists, however simply put, it doesn’t need to. Check out Lonely Day below, and grab a free download if you want.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
